item.title: A quick Bash function to Open TablePlus
item.description: function tp { PORT=$(docker-compose port mysql 3306 | cut -d: -f2) NAME=$(basename $(pwd)) DATABASE=$(cat docker-compose.yml | grep MYSQL_DATABASE | cut -d: -f2 | xargs) open "mysql://root:root@127.0.0.1:$PORT/$DATABASE?Enviroment=local&Name=$NAME&statusColor=DAEBC2" }
